resources.string: To proceed with your identification, allow the App to access your camera. By clicking \'Continue\' you will be taken to the settings page where you have to click \'Manage Permissions\' and provide Camera permission to the app.
Position your face in the oval to take picture
1. Position your face at the marked position
2. Keep it at still position without rapid movement
3. If the preview shown is satisfying, Press \'Continue\'
